item.title: Design User View
item.description: Design User View js/src/designcomps/designuserview.js Landing Page for Design side, presents list of available templates and option to create a template State Variables template_rows Stores the meta data for each template: {name, email, created, lastModified, id}

item.title: Components Used in Both Survey and Design
item.description: Design and Survey Share a few components: CommonMenu js/src/commoncomps/CommonMenu.js Present on all pages, contains the header, logo, link to homepage and sign out button CommonAuthGate js/src/commoncomps/CommonAuthGate.js If the user is logged in, renders

item.title: Design Paths
item.description: List of URLs on the Design Side design No Paramaters Homepage, list of available templates and options to create new templates. Renders DesignUserView /design/create/template No Paramaters Creates new template Renders DesignCreateTemplate

item.title: Design Docs
item.description: Routing (Full List) Click here for an overview of url routing on the design side Pages Home Page - List of Previously Created Templates See DesignUserView View/Edit Template Page See DesignTemplateView
